activities: Personal information is collected and transferred from the EU concerning Best Doctors' employment, provision of services, legal and other business activities.  Best Doctors collects and transfers personal information provided to it by consumers, employees, healthcare professionals and business partners.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Best Doctors has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) to resolve disputes.
